name: Harpic Fresh Citrus Toilet Cleaner
description: Harpic is a special formula that treats tough and unreachable places in the washroom. You get a completely clean & germ-free bathroom which you had never imagined possible. Removes tough stains. Kills germs. Eliminates limescale. Do not use this product on brass, aluminium or copper. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
